snippet: Leaders of a far-right Hungarian political party accused Israelis of plotting to buy up large parts of Hungary.
lead_paragraph: Leaders of a far-right Hungarian political party accused Israelis of plotting to buy up large parts of Hungary.

headline.seo: Far-Right Groups Protest World Jewish Congress in Budapest
headline.main: Nationalists Protest Jewish Congress in Hungary
headline.print_headline: Nationalists Protest Jewish Congress in Hungary
